00012 #define _CURVES_H

00014 #include <iostream>         // Readable output
00015 #include <NTL/ZZ.h>         // Arbitrarily large integers
00016 #include <NTL/ZZ_pE.h>      // Field elements from @f$ \mathbf{F}_{p^n} @f$
00017 #include <NTL/GF2E.h>       // Field elements from @f$ \mathbf{F}_{2^n} @f$
00018 #include "utilities.h"      // Utilities header for e2c2 project

00024     //------- Class Skeletons -------//
00025 
00033     enum class CurveID {
00034         Odd,
00035         Binary,
00036         Twisted
00037     };
00038 
00049     template <class Elt, CurveID ID>
00050     class Curve {
00051     public:
00054         Elt c;
00055 
00058         Elt d;
00059 
00061         NTL::ZZ m;
00062 
00064         Curve() : c(), d(), m() {}
00065 
00067         ~Curve() {}
00068 
00070         Curve(const Elt& c, const Elt& d, const NTL::ZZ& m) :
00071                 c(c), d(d), m(m) {
00072             if (!parametersValid(*this))
00073                 throw InvalidParametersException();
00074         }
00075 
00077         bool operator==(const Curve& that) const {
00078             return (c == that.c) && (d == that.d) && (m == that.m);
00079         }
00080 
00082         bool operator!=(const Curve& that) const {
00083             return not(*this == that);
00084         }
00085 
00087         NTL::ZZ cardinality() const {
00088             return m;
00089         }
00090 
00092         friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out,
00093                 const Curve& curve) {
00094             out << getName(curve) << std::endl
00095                 << "Curve parameter #1: "  << curve.c << std::endl
00096                 << "Curve parameter #2: "  << curve.d << std::endl
00097                 << "Cardinality: " << curve.m;
00098             return out;
00099         }
00100     };
00101 
00102 
00103     //------- Edwards Curves -------//
00104 
00110     using OddCurve = Curve<NTL::ZZ_pE, CurveID::Odd>;
00111 
00112 
00117     inline std::string getName(const OddCurve&) {
00118         return std::string("Edwards Curve over odd field");
00119     }
00120 
00125     inline bool parametersValid(const OddCurve& curve) {
00126         return (curve.c != 0 && NTL::sqr(curve.c) + curve.c != curve.d);
00127     }
00128 
00134     inline bool curveEquation(const OddCurve& curve, const NTL::ZZ_pE& x,
00135             const NTL::ZZ_pE& y) {
00136         auto xx = NTL::sqr(x), yy = NTL::sqr(y);
00137         return (xx + yy == NTL::sqr(curve.c) * (1 + curve.d * xx * yy));
00138     }
00139 
00140 
00145     using BinaryCurve = Curve<NTL::GF2E, CurveID::Binary>;
00146 
00151     inline std::string getName(const BinaryCurve&) {
00152         return "Binary Edwards Curve";
00153     }
00154 
00159     inline bool parametersValid(const BinaryCurve& curve) {
00160         return (curve.c * curve.d * (1 - curve.d * NTL::power(curve.c, 4)) !=
00161                 0);
00162     }
00163 
00169     inline bool curveEquation(const BinaryCurve& curve, const NTL::GF2E& x,
00170             const NTL::GF2E& y) {
00171         auto xx = NTL::sqr(x), yy = NTL::sqr(y);
00172         return (curve.c * (x + y) + curve.d * (xx + yy)
00173                 == (x + xx) * (y + yy));
00174     }
00175 
00176 
00181     using TwistedCurve = Curve<NTL::ZZ_pE, CurveID::Twisted>;
00182 
00187     inline std::string getName(const TwistedCurve&) {
00188         return "Twisted Edwards Curve";
00189     }
00190 
00195     inline bool parametersValid(const TwistedCurve& curve) {
00196         return (curve.c != curve.d) || ((curve.c == 0) || (curve.d == 0));
00197     }
00198 
00204     inline bool curveEquation(const TwistedCurve& curve, const NTL::ZZ_pE& x,
00205             const NTL::ZZ_pE& y) {
00206         auto xx = NTL::sqr(x), yy = NTL::sqr(y);
00207         return (curve.c * xx + yy == 1 + curve.d * xx * yy);
00208     }
00209 }
